infotexts.thal_timedcollar_traitorobjectivestartme: Now that your crew has settled into the ship, you might finally have a chance to make some easy cash at long last. First thing's first:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_goalinfotext_1: In the [targethullname], check the cabinets. You can see the room names on a Status Monitor or an Automap.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivefailmessage1: Welp. You couldn't even manage to get the collar somehow, and that's probably the end of your payment opportunity. Guess it's back to the classifieds of The Europan.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivesuccessmessage: This is it. A weapons dealer "commissioned" you to try this on a live subject. You'd hate to have one of these strapped around your neck, and normally you'd hate to do the strapping, but you need the credits.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_traitorobjectivestartme: Careful not to use it on accident. Now, you'll need a diversion for everyone to occupy themselves with while you find a subject.\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_goalinfotext_2: Sabotage the engine. It needs to be disabled to distract the attention of the others.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivefailmessage2: So much for disabling the engine. Without a proper distraction, this mission has already failed.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivesuccessmessage: Nice. That'll slow the ship down and get heads turning.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_traitorobjectivestartme: It's showtime! Your contractor spent hours searching for a test subject who would not be missed. Now their fate has arrived.\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_goalinfotext_3: Knock out [targetname] somehow and strap the collar onto their head. Survive and evade detainment during the countdown, and see the collar to its detonation!
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivefailmessage3: Shit! Almost. Your contractor wanted the collar to kill the subject alive and nothing else. Unfortunately, you'll have to find work elsewhere, maybe in a restaurant or something, because this mission just flopped.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivesuccessmessage: Holy shit! They're fucking dead. Obviously. Okay, don't panic, you need to get the hell out of here!
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_traitorobjectivestartme: You need to escape before things get worse. The operative said you'd be picked up, and you can't afford to stay on this ship any longer!\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_goalinfotext_4: Put a distance of 200 meters between yourself and the sub, whether through shuttle or underwater scooter.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivefailmessage4: Oops. That did not work out the way you were expecting it to at all.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivesuccessmessage: That should be far enough. You see what looks like a well armed military shuttle in the distance and hail to them. They slow to pick you up. Here comes the money!
